creator: saadis01@gmail.com
text:
I just installed the latest version Apache2 Build 2.0.55 on Windows XP. To 
keep things simple, I have an html page that uses an embedded flash in it. 
The .swf file is only 19KB. When I request the file using the URL http://<my 
server>/temp/index.html it works while I'm physically in the machine but when 
I try to request the same URL from a internet (work PC) it doesn't load the 
swf file and the CPU goes to about 100% and never comes down. 

If the index.html file contains plain text, the server behaves normally.

Thanks,
Saqib

creator: nick@webthing.com
text: No response to Joshua.  And looks like a notabug.
